title: Tales from the Floating Vagabond
description: TALES FROM THE FLOATING VAGABOND is set up to parody movies, books, TV, and comics. You pick from a list of races like Human, Dogman, RhinoMan, Cute Fuzzy Thing, etc., select a special comedic power (called a 'Schtick') like The Rambo Effect or The Newton Effect, flesh out your attributes and off-the wall skills and you are ready to adventure in a universe where the laws of physics are out to lunch.
author: Lee Garvin
